name: choo
description: A 7kb framework for creating sturdy frontend applications

scripts.test:server: standard && npm run deps && NODE_ENV=test node tests/server/*
scripts.test:server:cov: standard && npm run deps && NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover tests/server/*
scripts.test:browser: standard && npm run deps && NODE_ENV=test zuul tests/browser/*
scripts.test:browser:local: standard && npm run deps && NODE_ENV=test zuul --local 8080 -- tests/browser/*
scripts.preversion: if [ ! -z $SKIP_TEST ]; then npm run test:browser; fi
scripts.build:min: NODE_ENV=production browserify index.js --standalone=choo -t envify -g unassertify -g uglifyify | uglifyjs > dist/choo.min.js
scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p 'dist/' && npm run build:dev && npm run build:min
